scenes.background: You are on annual leave, enjoying some well-deserved time off to recharge. However, during your time away, a colleague messages you privately, saying there’s an urgent task that needs immediate attention. The request creates a dilemma as you try to balance respecting your time off while feeling the pressure to help with the urgent task. Your colleague, Mark, messages: 'Hey Alex, I really need your help with this urgent task. Can you help me out?' You responded, 'Mark, I'm currently on leave. Can you ask someone else, or can it wait until I return?' Mark replies, 'I understand you're off, but there's really no one else who can handle this as well as you. It's quite critical.' You then said, 'I understand the urgency. I'll help this time, but please ensure there’s a backup plan for such situations in the future.' Mark, relieved, replies, 'Thanks, Alex. I really appreciate it.' Later, your colleagues [Monica] and [Bob] also get wind of the situation. [Monica] says, 'Alex, it's really nice of you to help out during your leave.' [Bob] adds, 'But isn't it a bit unfair that you're being pulled in during your time off?' You replied, 'It's frustrating, but sometimes you just have to step up when needed.'
scenes.description: [Monica] nods, 'I get that, but it feels like people are taking advantage of your willingness to help.' [Bob] chimes in, 'Yeah, it's like there's no respect for your personal boundaries.'

options.text: Maybe you're right, but what can you do? It's part of the job.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the issue but display moderate emotional perception and empathy. However, the lack of proactive solutions and lower motivation reflect a need for better self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: I don't mind helping, but there should be some kind of appreciation or compensation for such efforts.
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception and social skills by advocating for appreciation or compensation, but balancing empathy and self-regulation could be improved.

options.text: It's getting a bit much. Maybe I should discuss this with management.
options.analysis: You display good self-regulation by considering discussing boundaries with management, but empathy is slightly lower as it focuses more on personal concerns.
